perturbation.original_text: All such communications, if personally delivered on a Business Day, will be conclusively deemed to have been received by a Party hereto and to be effective when so delivered, or if sent by overnight courier service on the earlier of the Business Day when confirmation of delivery is provided by such service or when actually received by such Party, or if sent by certified or registered mail on the third Business Day after the Business Day on which deposited in the mail. Each Party will use [...***...] to provide additional notice by email but the failure to provide such notice will not affect the validity of any such notice. Either Party may change its address by giving the other notice thereof in the manner provided herein.
perturbation.changed_text: All such communications, if personally delivered on a Business Day, will be conclusively deemed to have been received by a Party hereto and to be effective when so delivered. Either Party may change its address by giving the other notice thereof in the manner provided herein.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specifics of how communications are deemed effective when sent by overnight courier or certified/registered mail, but keeping the statement that either party can change their address, the contract becomes contradictory. It's unclear how a change of address is 'given' if the defined methods of notice are no longer fully specified. This creates uncertainty in ensuring that important contractual notices (like notice of breach) are properly served and received.

perturbation.original_text: Subject to the provisions of this Agreement, Miltenyi is willing to grant to Bellicum a non-exclusive sublicense to its rights obtained under the [...***...] License Agreement in the form of a separate agreement between Miltenyi and Bellicum, under such separate sublicense agreement Bellicum would agree to hold harmless and reimburse Miltenyi for the fees that are due to [...***...] based on Bellicum's use of the sublicense rights for Bellicum Products ("[...***...] Sublicense Agreement").
perturbation.changed_text: Subject to the provisions of this Agreement, Miltenyi is willing to grant to Bellicum a non-exclusive sublicense to its rights obtained under the [...***...] License Agreement in the form of a separate agreement between Miltenyi and Bellicum, under such separate sublicense agreement Bellicum would agree to hold harmless Miltenyi for the fees that are due to [...***...] based on Bellicum's use of the sublicense rights for Bellicum Products ("[...***...] Sublicense Agreement").
perturbation.explanation: Removing 'and reimburse Miltenyi' introduces an inconsistency. The original text establishes a separate agreement for sublicense rights, including a commitment to hold Miltenyi harmless and reimburse their fees. By omitting the reimbursement clause, we create a contradiction because while the agreement is for Bellicum to 'hold harmless' which implies covering any fees to Miltenyi, now Bellicum is only responsible for holding harmless without a clear financial obligation to reimburse actual payments. This makes the enforcement uncertain because the financial implications are ambiguous.
perturbation.location: EXHIBIT D [...***...] Sublicense Royalties and/or Licensee Fees

perturbation.original_text: Provided Bellicum is not then in default with its material obligations hereunder, Bellicum may exercise each such renewal option by giving written notice to Miltenyi not later than six (6) months prior to the expiration of the current Term.
perturbation.changed_text: Bellicum may exercise each such renewal option by giving written notice to Miltenyi not later than six (6) months prior to the expiration of the current Term.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the phrase "Provided Bellicum is not then in default with its material obligations hereunder," we create a contradiction. Previously, the ability to renew the contract was conditional upon Bellicum's adherence to its obligations. Now, this condition is removed, yet the contract still contains clauses specifying Bellicum's obligations (e.g., payment terms, forecasts). If Bellicum fails to meet those obligations, yet can still renew the contract, this creates uncertainty regarding the enforceability of these obligations during the renewal term, as well as potential disputes over whether a renewed term can be voided due to pre-existing breaches.
